channel.title: Object Cases with More Than First Option
channel.description:
NOTE: I have an Allstar base. Only give me answers with Allstar or Delta (I can translate Delta).
For example,
I have a ladder (object ID= 1748). I have the option of "climb", "climb-up", and "climb-down". If you were to code the ladder to use the case 1748, you'd be coding the "climb" option. But what do you do to code the cases for "climb-up" and "climb-down"?
This concept is similar to farming too. How would I code the "inspect" and "guide" rather than just "harvest"?
Anywho, for the "climb" option of the ladder, I tried incorporating NpcWanneTalk as an option to select "Up" or "Down" and then using those answers to teleport your heightLevel -1 or +1. That failed.
Is there a way to have a selective option of "Up" or "Down" when coding case 1748 for the ladder? This isn't mandatory for me if I can code the other options of "climb-up" and "climb-down". Please help anyone!
Thanks Much, (Rep ++ to the wonderful helper)
TheCyberMan

item.title: Object Cases with More Than First Option
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

Obviously I have tried. That is why I made this support document…

Read full topic
